title: Which K-pop bands had inappropriate outfits? - Quora

response.answer_text: Twice needs a stylist that speaks English.  While performing a cover of thewholesome and iconic Gee by SNSD, Tzuyu had a shirt on that said, “Hoes Take Off Your Clothes” … Not quite as explicit but still amusing is Jihyo's “CARBS" shirt, and Jeongyeon's top that reads, “I ❤ COLD BEER"  Edit: Tzuyu also had an inappropriate outfit for Yes or Yes.  “daddy" “spank" “lick" “mouthful" “bottomed" “cherry" …

I can’t really remember at the top of my head but I would have to say there are a couple idols that wear ridiculous shirt that have funny and inappropriate words on them. Some stylist put female idols into really uncomfortable and short outfits a lot of times.
